data.message: you are the one you are the master of your fans lol you are spectacular you are the one that puts a smile on my face you turn my frown upside down you are the one that is the sexyest man in this world alive you are lyrical fasinating u inspire me everyday you are a legend *giggles* ill be your real nikkii minaj you can stick your penus in  my anus we are living  out our dreams we are where we should be i love ya sexy man sexy cool smart funny rap god *giggles* i want my whole wall with one billboard  photo of you insane love ya to bits*giggles*got my own money dont need yours im in the fast lane need to slow down *giggles*ur awesome*giggles* your just like a firework show them what your worth your a rap bot  rap  god luv ya your ridiculas amazing *giggles*
